doc.title: If Only I Were an Indian...
doc.plot: Three Canadian Amerindians travel to the Czech Republic to take part in an unusual gathering. In that country, there is a significant portion of people who, on vacations, have adapted the cultural and philosophical trappings of the various Native American tribes as a way to find a better way to live after years of communist rule. The trio have to come to learn if these people are just horsing around, or do they show a real respect for the culture and belief of the first citizens of North America.
